name: Anglo American Brands Quiz / Test | Business World | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a dish liquid?
questions.explanation:
Fairy Liquid.

	Grimeaway is made up, 'Bubblin Hot' is a Pato Banton song and Rusty Brillo is an Irish Italian boxer... Well if he ain't, he should be.

questions.text: Which one of these brands is not a gravy mixture?
questions.explanation:
Snickers.

	Snickers is the brand name for a chocolate bar, manufactured by Mars Incorporated.

questions.text: All of these are antacids except?
questions.explanation:
Ex-gas.

	What could possibly be interesting about indigestion?

questions.text: All of these beers come in brown bottles in the USA except _____ ?
questions.explanation:
Heineken.

	The famous green bottle is part of the Heineken image.  Heineken does come in a brown bottle in the Netherlands, its home country. However, for export purposes do they change the colour of the bottle.

questions.text: Find the well known cheese brand.
questions.explanation:
Laughing Cow.

	YUMMY ... Cheese and trivia, what a product!

questions.text: Find the well known foot care brand.
questions.explanation:
Dr Scholl's.

	Sorry I have no foot notes...

Sara Lee.

	Brightman and Vaughan are singers and Miles is an actress. Sara Lee (as well as being spelled differently) is a well-known dessert brand.

questions.text: All of these are bread brands except?
questions.explanation:
Weetabix.

	Weetabix is a cereal ... Bet you can't eat three!

questions.text: All of these are American cigarette brands except?
questions.explanation:
Raffles.

	Don't be fooled by the 'English' sounding names. The only English brand here is Raffles.

Red Bull.

	All are bottled water brands... Red Bull is an energy drink.
